PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-03632008-02-18,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of LEO LEDOHOWSKI of Winnipeg, Manitoba, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending February 28, 2011, in the place of Thomas J. Rice, effective March 1, 2008.
